mapper.insert: insert into admin(adminName, password, name, email, status, createTime, adminImg) values (#{adminName}, #{password}, #{name}, #{email}, #{status}, #{createTime}, #{adminImg});
mapper.select: select adminName, name, email, status, createTime, loginTime from admin;
select adminName, password, name, email, status, adminImg from admin where adminName = #{adminName};
